subTitle_pleaseConnectWithYourGuardianAd: To begin, please connect with your {{conceptGuardianAddress}}.
ticker_message_confirmIAmNotACitizenOrRe: I confirm that I am not a citizen, resident of, or otherwise located in any of the following:
ticker_subMessage_otherRegions: Any country or region subject to comprehensive sanctions, including, but not limited to, the Crimean region of Ukraine, Cuba, Iran, Lebanon, North Korea, Sudan and Syria.
